name: Recreation of Molnár 1
description: I wanted to make a recreation of Molnárs work, but with more structure and clean lines. The foundation is made out of Garrit's code example but with my own tweaks and adjustments.

name: Recreation of Molnár 2
description: This version is somewhat inspired by Molnár but with the thoughts of flowers instead of squares. The lines has different thickness and colors to make the drawing feel more alive.

name: Recreation of Molnár 3
description: This version is somewhat inspired by Molnár but with the thoughts of flowers instead of squares. The lines has different thickness and colors to make the drawing feel more alive.
